newsitem.title: USA: EMC Insurance Q3 net rises.
newsitem.headline: EMC Insurance Q3 net rises.

text.p: (All data above 000s except per share numbers)
NOTE: Operating income, which excluded realized gains was $0.31 a share in the 1996 third quarter compared to $0.26 a year ago.
Operating income for the first nine months of 1996 was $0.75 a share compared to $1.12 a share a year ago.
The company's GAAP combined ratio was 103.3 percent in the 1996 third quarter compared to 105.7 percent in the year-ago period.
Year-to-date, the GAAP combined ratio was 106.0 percent compared to 101.0 percent a year ago.
Catastrophe and storm losses were $0.16 a share in the 1996 third quarter, including $0.05 a share from Hurricane Fran, compared to $0.14 a share in the 1995 third quarter.
For the first nine months of 1996, catastrophe and storm losses amounted to $0.45 a share compared to $0.33 a share a year ago.
